ValidationRule.description: Force users to enter values in the Vendor address fields, when either the 'Check - Mail to Vendor' or 'Check - Return to PAC' value is chosen for the Payment Method field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ( (ISPICKVAL(Payment_Method__c, 'Check - Mail to Vendor')) || (ISPICKVAL(Payment_Method__c, 'Check - Return to PAC')) ), ( (ISBLANK(Vendor_City__c) ) || (ISPICKVAL(Vendor_State_Province__c, '') ) || (ISBLANK(Vendor_Street_Address1__c) ) || (ISBLANK(Vendor_Zip_Postal_Code__c) ) ), ($Profile.Name <>"System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must populate the Vendor address fields when selecting Payment Method = 'Check - Mail to Vendor' or 'Check - Return to PAC'.
